bibl.title: More than Words: Imperial Discourse in Greek Papyri.
bibl.note: ""Roman"" documents. - Appearances and functions of imperial titles. - Developments in discourse? Imperial titles in Greek papyri from the third century. - Conclusion. - Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
